value.text:
Hi! 😊 Sorry to hear your messages are disappearing. Yeh common problem ho sakta hai chat apps mein.

Possible reasons:
1. Network slow hai ya connection unstable.
2. App refresh ho raha hai automatically.
3. Message bahut lamba hai ya special characters use kiye.
4. Typing karte time send nahi hua properly.

Try this:
- Check internet connection.
- Type shorter messages.
- Copy-paste your message if it's important.

Kya aap study se related kuch poochna chahte the? Main help karungi! 📚
follow_up_questions: Kya message study ka tha? Batao main help karun!
Kaunsa app use kar rahe ho? Details do.
